extendedInfo.description: Swamp Defense is a classic tower defense game for any beginners or defensive specialist. Fight your way through a large number of levels with different routes. Unique tower types help you to defeat the Swamp Monsters. Help the family to get rid of the evil breed.The FamilyOld FlintSlows Monsters, minimal DamageWeapon: Denture adhesiveHankHigh damage, shoots trough enemiesWeapon: Electro beamMaggieSplash damage, much damageWeapon: Kitchen ApliancesBusterModerate damage, middle range, rapit fire rateWeapon: Pistol, GunLittle JoeLong range, incredible damage, splash damageWeapon: Rocket launcherFeatures:- 5 different Towers (the family)- 8 types of enemies- Endless waves (if you are good enough ;) )- unlockable levels- StatisticsHow To PlayPut a tower on the edge of the course by tapping with your fingers on the screen. Depending on the available money you can put a weak or strong tower. If you've killed enemies, then you get money. With this money you can improve an existing tower or buy new towers. To improve a tower, tap the desired tower and pick the Button for update (Arrow Up). In this menu you can also sell the tower ($).Help us to improve this game! If you have problems or a crash please report it and write a short email to us with informations about the problems and your hardware and Android version. We canÂ´t reply to user comments so it is not easy to find the problems. Mail to: mail@entwickler-x.deAlso available for iPhone / iPad (iOS) , Windows Phone 7, Xbox 360 and Amiga OS4.1

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: I love this game. Great defense game. Hilarious subject. Pretty hard but awesome.

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Awesome tower defense game & catchy music!

reviews.title: Very dissapointed
reviews.comment: Crushes at level 2!!!!!Reached level 5 and dindn\'t save it!!!! I have tried several times.Waste of time and money.Pleasr fix this asap!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Straight forward and fun to play
reviews.comment: Great defense type game. Works good on my Acer Iconia Tab A100. I would like to see Hank do more damage than he does. The other characters seem to do the damage you would expect as they get upgraded, but Ole Hank isn\'t carrying his weight in this game. Otherwise.....I really enjoy playing this game!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best tower defense I\'ve come across so far on android.
